column2: We are seeking engineers to strengthen our technical team. The engineer should have knowledge in Installation and configuration of Cisco,  Routers,  Switches & firewalls. Knowledge of LAN Security & Desktop Security. Hands on Experience in working on UTM s. Knowledge of Routing protocols,  CLI commands. Installation and configuration of windows,  experience in Hardware troubleshooting & assembling ?? Technical Background BE,  B.Tech,  B Sc,  or Diploma ?? CCNA certification is a Must. CCNP or CCDA will be advantage ?? 2 to 6 years of relevant work experience in Networking ??
